content.detailedDescription: I was out back of our house walking the dogs and i looked up at the sky,i looked up in the same area were i had another sighting recently that i also reported to mufon.This sighting looked kind of ike the last one in which it looked like a star but what happend tonight was as i was looking at this star it twinkled and then it flashed like the flash on a camera only it was a super bright blue flash and then it dissapered.
content.summary: Blue like color looked like a star

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking at work on a break.I noticed a very bright light hovering just over the peak of bear mtn,a 3thousand ft mtn. approximately 2 miles from my location.No movement just an unnatural looking extremely bright light.I went inside the store and brought my co. worker outside to see the light.We watched it for approximately 25minutes as it remained motionless. suddenly it began to resend.It moved slowly and in 30 seconds it disappeared behind the mtn. top.When it decended i knew what it wasn't but not what it was.We went back over to the front of the store where we normally hang out and were talking about what we just saw when out of the east came a giant craft.Being a usaf veteran i can attest that there is nothing like this in our inventory.I estimated it to be a half mile wide and i made its speed to be about 100mph.Its altitude was about 1 mile.It came right over us.The total time it took for it to pass overhead was 8 to 10 mins.The craft was the same color as an sr71 i had seen.A stealthy looking black.We noticed surface features like the craft was compartmentalized.It reminded me of being under my car at the shop when it was on the lift.We were a full service gas station and convenience store.A car came in for gas while the craft was passing over. we ignored the customer cause we were watching the ufoshe beeped her horn and asked for 15.In gas.We said we were  busy watching a ufo.Anyway i pumped her gas and we all watched it pass over.The customer left and we continued watching.Until the end of the ship passed over then we lost sight of it.It occurred to me later that the giant craft flight path was on a course straight for the strange glowing object we had seen earlier.Now 10 years after the event i have a almost compulsive desire to talk about it.
content.summary: Saw a bright light hovering over 3 thousand ft mountain top.Followed by an 8 to 10 mile long giant black craft

content.detailedDescription: I was with some friends going to a event at the greenway avenue stadium. i saw these yellow glowing slow moving object that were going north. the objects were circles.
content.summary: Slow moving yellow light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on the south bound lane of pacific coast highway around 6:00 am pst.  at the stop light i noticed a hovering orangish colored glowing orb about 200-300 ft in elevation towards the south east.  i stared at ith for about 10-15 seconds before it disintegrated.  it imploded into nothing.  the duration of time for it took to begin disappearing to completely gone was about .5 to 1 second.
content.summary: Stationary glowing orb that disintegrated after 15 seconds of observation

content.detailedDescription: Saw a white object stationary then flew over my house, white blinking, size about the size of a small car, blinking .Very brite, no sound
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a large white object, stationary then went over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened around september 27, 2013, at la mision, near ensenada, in  baja california, mexico, in the evening.  i was reminded of it after watching a tv program about orbs of light
.
my wife, patricia, was lying on a hospital bed in the living room of a modern house on a high hill overlooking the pacific ocean at the mouth of the mision river, an arroyo flowing west when there was sufficient water.

she was dying from cancer at home surrounded by friend and caregivers and it was expected that she would die soon.

a friend of hers, named ella welsch, from mount juliet, tennessee, had been visiting for  the purpose of helping care for patricia.  at the time of the event, she was pacing and looking through some glass doors when she called out to me to look out the doors.

i did and saw three orbs of light seemingly floating in air in the back garden.  they appeared to be about 6 inches in diameter.  one appeared to settle for a time on a large rock at the edge of the lawn.

i speculated that they represented her passed family members coming to pick patricia up when she died, which was shortly thereafter.

ella took two snapshots with her camera, which she said proved the orbs were not reflections because they were taken from different angles.

i do not know what they were in spite of my speculation.
content.summary: Hovering orbs of light on date to my wife's passing

content.detailedDescription: Elevento ocurrio en la localidad de chochis santa cruz de la sierra bolivia estavamos de vacaciones ya conociamos historias que se veian cosa en ese lugar desidimo ir aver despues de visitar todos los lugares caminamos 2 kilometros del santuario de chochis en dicho lugar fuimos a aver la finca de un amigo que tiene en el lugar cuando vimos una luz de lejos donde estavan sus vacas fuimos a investigar sorpresa fue la nuestra cuando nos ivamos acercando vimos que esta luz tomama forma cada ves que no hacercavamos mas al llegar muy serca vimos que esta maquina que vibraba estava impecionando las bacas del lugar por ensema de ellas iva i venia sacamos foto con el celular quedamos imprecionados ,,,luego se fue muy rapida mente a una velocidad imprecionante ,queda claro que seguiremos imvestigando esos lugares ...
content.summary: Forma cilindrica rondava los animales las vacas estudiandolas imprecionante
content.locationName: Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Santa Cruz

content.detailedDescription:
My wife cindy request i go outside and take some photos of a beautiful sunset in our backyard up in the endless mountains of pennsylvania. i take one picture, then another and move slightly to my right to take two more. i am thinking how strange to view the sun and the moon at the same time as i am taking a third photo. i look up above the camera then down to the view finder and take a photo. then i take a fourth photo. 

i am not sure what i saw for i thought it all was some type of illusion. how, strange to see the sun and moon together during a sunset. the next day i download the  camera and view the four photos. to my surprise, i was not imagining the two images that i view the day before. they are both on film. it dawned on me that the sun is setting and is below the mountain.

both objects are motionless. both white as you can view in the photo. both are perfectly round.

i see so many strange things on cable television on "strangest weather" and perhaps this event is nothing more than an illusion. perhaps something flew by the camera and camera took an out of focus photo of two objects. did i actually see the two objects with my eyes as i thought i did? 

thus, perhaps someone can tell me what they are seeing in my photo.
content.summary: I am taking four (4) sunset photos and i thought i am seeing the sun and moon at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: At 2am to400am i was flashing my flashlight at the for quite some time and i quit and went into the house. at 400am i went back out side and a transformer type ufo was coming over my house looking for me. i freaked and could not believe what i was seeing. i it watched as it went to another star. that star blinked at it and it zoomed away.
content.summary: A transporter came to get me

content.detailedDescription:
Witness 1, my wife.
     on russian new years around 8:15pm i was headed down to the the gym to pick up my daughter.  she had just called to say that only 2 of her friends and herself were there and she wanted to be picked up early.  as i rounded the corner by the culvert i though i saw a shooting star off to my right, towards the hillside.  as i got to the store/boat harbor area, i realized it was 3 blinking lights close together.  i thought maybe it was a remote control airplane or a drone, because it was really dark out, too late for planes to fly and too close to the hillside.  also the object was flying pretty fast.  i lost sight of it for a bit and drove on.
     when i arrived at the school i could see the 3 girls swinging on the swing set waiting for me.  my daughter came running at me full speed waiving her arms.  she was all excited saying "did u see that mom!!! it was a big drone or something right above us!! it hoovered right above us!!"  i searched the sky above the school and caught site of the blinking lights.  3 colors, the object traveled fast, south, toward the church, then took a sharp left out toward the bay.  it headed strait to the airstrip fast! i thought it was going to land. my daughter wanted me to follow it.  i turned by the post office and headed for home.  we were almost back to the culvert when we spotted it heading our way from the airstrip.  it was still out over the bay, my daughter wanted me to stop the truck. she said it was coming closer to check us out, that freaked me out but i stopped the truck anyway at the first beach pull off after the culvert.  i looked just in time to see the blinking lights fly up higher, fast and go towards the hillside.  we continued home and got out of the truck and looked towards the hillside just in time to see the lights go up, over the hill and disappear.

witness 2, my daughter.
     on russian new years eve, my two friends and i left night gym early.  as i waited for my mom, i heard a buzzing noise, almost like a blow drier.  i was swinging on the swing set and we saw it hoover for some 5 minutes about 8 feet above us.  after my mom pulled up, it glided toward the church and then over the ocean toward the airport.
     this drone type object was about the size of the hood of a truck and was diamond/pyramid shaped, u could see several layer/steps, top to bottom and a different light on each side, red, green, orange and white.
     after we saw it gliding towards the airport my mom turned the truck off the road and i could see the drone was tracking us.  we continued home and after parking in our drive way we saw it glide over the mountains and out of sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo glided around and hoovered over several areas of old harbor at low alt.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from class around 6:50pm and the stars were really bright in the sky so i stayed looking for a moment when i noticed the object. it appeared to be triangular in shape with 3 lights. none of the lights flashed or were red or green like a plane or helicopter. they were steady lights. as i came down the hill to my neighborhood i could see the object to the north, and then briefly lost visibility. as i pulled into my driveway i knew i would be able to see the object again so i looked towards the left where the object last was, and it was directly above me. i honked the horn so my son's dad would come outside, and he observed the object as well and stated that it was making a noise like that of a plane. i thought it sounded louder then what a plane would. it also seemed to be moving rather quickly and changed directions very easily. i lost sight of the object as it moved towards the east and over some trees in the neighborhood.
content.summary: I was driving home and saw a triangular shaped object at a distance, as i neared my residence the object was directly above me then moved away.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed, but sometimes i like to watch the sky before go to sleep, and yesterday i have seen something amazing. checked all i can. no iridium flares or iss on the sky above my house.It couldn't be an airplane or helicopter, i know how these look like at night. that was kinda weird sight, because you can confuse it with a satelite because of uniform, rectilinear movement, maybe it was the other satelite which i don't know. please, check this out. i report, because it has a pulsating, influent light changing from white, through orange to violet over and over again, before disapeared behind a tree changed its shape or tilted to right so i was able to see a disc-like shape. i could not get a good look at the object, it was beautiful, i had chills. sorry my english, and sorry i have not any photo, because it was too small and it's no sense to take off my mobile phone to snap a good picture at night. however, it was unusual.
content.summary: No iss or flare

content.detailedDescription: Tampa. in process of taking photos of strange smoke trail in sky caused by missile? ufo captured by accident, i did not notice till later.
content.summary: Ufo photo captured by accident

content.detailedDescription: As i drove north on us hwy 281 i noticed smoke from a grass or house fire ahead. as i got a bit closer i observed a bright circular light in the sky. while driving i was able to get a picture of the object. it seemed to be keeping an eye on the fire.
content.summary: Circular stationary object

content.detailedDescription: I will preface this by saying i am not crazy or on drugs, i am former military (us.Army 82nd airborne).My girlfriend and i went to new hampshire to stay for the weekend of august 27,28,29 in 2010 at our friends newly cleared heavily wooded vacation property, it was located just north of maddison n.H.And just south of laconia n.H. right near lake winnipesaukee. it was saturday the 28th, it was roughly 11:45pm, a friend and myself were outside sitting by the fire when i noticed 2 red glowing balls very high in the sky, it was crystal clear out that night and not a cloud in the sky,i commented to my friend saying i wonder if that's a satellite or planet honestly had no idea what it was,so jokingly i said maybe it's aliens, then i pulled out a flashlight and began flashing it in the sky in the direction of the red lights, i was only joking with my friend saying maybe they'll answer.At this point both red lights began to move back and forth erratically and pulsating a red glow, it was still to far away to make out any details, my friend and i became extremely unsettled at this point, i immediately stopped flashing the light, when i did they kept pulsating moving back and forth from left to right. now is where it gets a bit strange. we are literally in the middle of nowhere in the woods and as the red lights were still moving around and flashing, i see this very bright white orb about the size of a softball slowly moving through the trees about 4 to 5 feet off the ground towards me and my friend, i asked my friend what is that? he replied very shakily with firefly maybe? i laughed and said fireflys flash they don't just glow. this orb passed right in front of us no more than 15 feet away, it slowly passed us and down the front side of the trailer it then made a sharp right hand turn at the end of the trailer and disappeared. i turned to my friend and said what the heck just happened, then we both looked up and the two red lights were gone too. was it a ufo? what was that white orb? some sort of probe? i don't know but none of slept that night and we left the next day. i haven't been back since. this is the first time i am speaking publicly about this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw 2 red orbs in the sky, flashed a lighter at them,then they began to move erratically back and forth.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading home and looked up and saw shooting star and saw orange like orb no sound and changes direction many times. same speed. i was next to a buildning, so i could not see where it flews away.

i have no proof. no pictures. i think i was only one who saws that.

what kind of camera can i use if i should see one again?
content.summary: I saw orange like thimg that flew and changes direction many times

content.detailedDescription: Ok, so my friend jorge and i were going to visit my grandmas for the weekend. she lives up in the mountains with no neighbors, roads, or closely located facilities anywhere. we were sitting in her green house late at night when i thought i noticed a shooting star outside the windowing in the roof.  after focusing for a bit longer i realized what i thought was a shooting star is now still. so i dismissed it and went back to hanging out.  only after another hour i saw the "star" slowing drifting like a plane, so again i didn't pay it much attention.  what caught my eye on this very clear night was the sudden downward movement of the light. paying attention to it now the drifting progressively turned into quick movements, quick enough that the light trailed behind itself moving so fast a small + sign was in the sky. just as soon as my amazement took over and i started to question what it could be, it dramatically stopped, then began to quickly brighten making no noise. mind you we were on the top of a canyon so a small plane would have no business flying literally 50ft next to the small house we were in. only then when it passes the greenhouse i could relate it to a plane in terms of noise, but the surface was pitch black, and i saw a brighten cockpit, but right after it passed no noise, lights nothing.  so we say there and explained what we just saw in awe. i thought maybe we had been kind of loud cause we were slightly worried we didn't know what happened, that's when i thought my grandma was coming to check on us which was odd. the light i saw wasnt on the small dirt road but approaching up an almost vertical incline horizontal to it.  what i saw then has made me question my existence as an individual, because i saw a outline of a person made of light. imagine a normal weighted man, but  his outline was a culmination of colors but i could see through the center of it. that and when it walked it left almost copies or like a slinky stretching of fading images in the previous stance of its walk. only to continue across the path,up another sheer face of 20 ft, and disappear into one giant flash.  i checked the ground no footprints or any sign of evidence that something was there, even were the light brighten and the event ended, i went and check to find a few bushes nothing more. as this went on though i felt privileged to see this. my grandma is the only other person to have seen anything strange before too just as a side note.
content.summary: We saw a star that started to make a plus sign in the sky, then brighten and fly by.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 12:30am on the morning of january 29th, 2016, i let my dogs outside. i live in a very secluded area so i tend to look at the stars often because there are hardly any lights obstructing the view of the sky. when i glanced at the sky i noticed a light brighter than anything else in the sky other than the moon, and upon focusing my attention on the object i quickly realized it was much larger and closer than the stars and was pulsing different colors, mostly white, blue, green, and purple, but much faster than i could really process. i stood staring at the object in shock as it moved from left to right, it would move  down slightly  and then jump back up quickly and seemed to be changing shape in no particular pattern or order. after i got my dogs back inside i grabbed my phone and took a couple of still photos along with an approximately 10 minute video. in the video, zoomed in, the color change is much more apparent and the object almost seems to be a ring with a hollow center - the first thing it reminded me of was a sand dollar or amoeba shape. there is some "human error" movement in the video, as i was using my cellphone, but it is very clear in the video that the object moves under its own control and zoomed in, almost seems to be spinning while the rapid color change takes place. i watch the stars all the time and have never seen anything like this in my life. it remained in the same general area in the sky, moving but returning to the same general location, for approximately an hour and a half when it slowly started to get smaller, as if it was moving away from my direction, and in the matter of seconds it was gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: At approximately 12:30am on january 29th, 2016, i let my dogs out when i noticed the bright pulsing light in the sky. it moved, changed shaped, & pulsed different colors. at 12:44am i took a 10 min video of what i was experiencing.

content.detailedDescription: We are there for ufo sighting,because somedays ago ufo seen by a man.At 7:30 pm we are seen  a lighte above a house and the light change his route very fast faster than any craft.Its caused affection on electricity,after 15 minutes its gone throw but unfortunately we didnt have any evidence.
content.summary: We are there for ufo sighting,because somedays ago ufo seen

content.detailedDescription: My story begins with what seemed to be a very unusual lucid dream. i do not remember dreams often and they are always typical dreams that change and morph. this was different. all of a sudden (in my "dream") i found myself standing in the hall bathroom doorway. i wondered how i had ended up there and why i was there. but my attention was quickly somehow pulled to my left backside. i turned my head over my left shoulder and saw the view of my dining room. i noticed all at once that there was not only a "grey"-type looking creature crouching under my dining room table looking at me, but i wondered "how can i see him through the chair? where is the 4th chair?" the chair that would be blocking my view of his position under the table just seemed to be missing. but this was all noticed in what seemed to be no more than a second. my thoughts were then no longer focused on me. i felt what he was feeling instead, as he stared back at me. he was angry. i knew he had been there for a while, he had not planned on, or wanted me to see him or know of his presence, and i felt his anger towards this dilemma. i could feel his fury growing. he was short and crouched, naked, enlarged head, and skin that i can only describe as seeming like shark skin. it was bluish and looked to be smooth, impervious, but textured as well. his shoulders leaned forward towards me as though he were dramatically leaning forward with his hands on his knees. he had a pot like belly and wrinkles around his almond eyes. after those first few moments of our encounter/exchange, i was awoken- finding myself back in my bedroom. me and my fiancé jumped awake at the same time to a huge crash in the room i had just been "dreaming" about. he went and checked first and i tried to stop him. i wanted to tell him what had happened before he went out there. he went and i followed from the bedroom to the dining room. the corner table had smashed to the ground, two legs broken off, although no pictures or vases on the table broke. it was even more strange that it seemed to be under the dining table. that's when we realized the dining table had moved a good 3 ft towards the wall with the corner table (where there is also a window). the window is alarmed. our alarm however had a one time malfunction that night. it is controlled by a tablet and the tablet just said the company name that manufactures it. no buttons worked, nothing on it worked at all. but all windows and doors were secure and locked. my fiancé was then drawn to the front window. he said let's look outside and to our shock two unusual and completely never before seen bright orbs hung ahead from our front door. this then further supported this strange encounter/happening in our home only moments earlier. we have several pics- one very good one of the orbs.
content.summary: Was seen after full encounter with grey-like creature in our home followed by a crashing table, alarm dismantling and other moved furniture. we looked outside after and saw unusual hovering lights- never seen anything like this over 3 years

content.detailedDescription: I just finished grocery shopping at canby, oregon fred meyer, looked up from the parking lot and observed 6 big, slow-moving orange orbs, coming from the north and heading south east, at about 8:30 pm  ...... there was an airplane near them, so i would imagine if you questioned the crew and passengers, you may get more verification. .......
content.summary: 6 orange fireballs above canby, oregon followed by an airplane

content.detailedDescription: Je revenais de travailler avec mon beau - frã¨re,on roulais dans le rang.. 2km. avant d'arriver ã  la maison nous apercevons deux grosse lumiã¨re dans le ciel. une rouge et une verte elle sont environ ã  20 pieds de distance.Il fait vraiment trop noir pour voir au milieu de ces grosse lumiã¨re mais c'est plus gros qu'un petit avion et ã§a ne bouge pas du tout.. ã§a reste sur place tout le temps que je l'ai observer (environ 10min) et 3 fois la hauteur d'un arbre mature, en plein milieu d'un champs. ou il n'y a rien d'habitude.  je me demande si il y a une nouvelle tour ã©lectrique sans rien comprendre.. l'objet ne bouge pas d'un poil jusqu'ã  ce qu'on arrive ã  la maison.Moi la tãªte vers l'arriã¨re en train de l'observer et de se poser des question..Suite en train dalluciner?? en arrivant nous courront au bout du terrain voir ces lumiã¨re ferme mais forte **comme des lumiã¨re de feu de circulation mais en plus gros** quand un auto passe et arrãªte au mãªme endroit que ces lumiã¨re et se tourne vers le champs en se rã©digeant 2-3 fois vers ces lumiã¨re et il reste pendant 2a3 minute a lobserver (je me dis â°je suis pas fouâ° et il repart.Jusqu'ã  ce que nous ne voyons plus ces lumiere.Nous allons ã  l'auto en courant et roulons le rang au complet en scrutant le ciel mais ne voyant rien nous retournons ã  la maison perplexe encore aujourd'hui.
content.summary: Grosse lumiã¨re verte et rouge assez ã©loigner aucun bruit. 9h du soir 3ã—hauteur des arbres milieu du champs

content.detailedDescription:
At 1.38am on 21st january 2016 i had gone outside to put something in the bin which is at the rear of my house.  on returning i noticed what i first thought was a bright star fairly low in the sky just above some treetops approximately 100m away.  it was a cold. clear night and the moon was very bright in the sky in a westerly direction. there were no clouds and many stars were visible.

what made me take notice was the apparent brightness of the object in relation to other stars in the sky and the fact that it was constantly changing colour.  i stood at my back door and observed it for 3 to 4 minutes mesmerised.  i'm familiar with looking at the night sky as i usually let my dog out in the garden before bedtime and sometimes have to wait several minutes for her to come back in so, to pass the time, if it's a clear night, i spend a few minutes gazing at the stars. 

the object was stationary above the trees in a sw direction approximately 30 degrees above the horixon.  it was brighter than any of the other stars in the sky and was continuously changing colour.  it would change from red to blue to green to white to yellow and so on several times per second.  i'm familiar with seeing stars twinkle but this was very different.

mystified as to what it could be i went back inside to get my iphone.  i have a stargazing app which, when you point your phone at the night sky, tells you what star/planet you are looking at.  the only thing i suspected it might be was the planet venus which sometimes appears very bright in the night sky.  however the app confirmed that venus wasn't visible in this part of the sky at the time and neither were there any stars of this brightness either.

i observed it changing colour for a few more minutes and then all of a sudden it just blinked out and disappeared. i waited to see if it reappeared but it didn't so after another few minutes i went back inside to get warm.

i was quite taken aback at what i had seen and several times i went to my back door to see if it had reappeared.  on my 3rd or 4th visit i saw it again but in a slightly different location and lower in the sky.  i can't remember how long i watched it this time, maybe another few minutes.  approximately 5 minutes later i went to the back door again but it had gone again.
content.summary: Bright star like light changing colours then blinked out

content.detailedDescription: For our tenth wedding anniversary my husband and i decided to make the trek to rachel, nv since we both love sci-fi and have always wanted to go there.  we were between the front and back gate when we saw these clouds so i whipped out my good camera to snap a few shots since the clouds looked cool but the more we look at them and the longer we watched them the more we have become convinced that they were unusual. i felt this huge need to share. i also live near an active air force base and have seen strange craft before but never ever like this.
content.summary: Cloud looking ships

content.detailedDescription:
This was a two day event,  the night of the first day i was in bed getting ready to go to sleep.  my girlfriend was sitting up reading and our two boston terriers were at the foot of the bed sleeping.  there were multiple taps on glass sounding like it came from living room.  my dogs heard this as well and immediately barked, and ran to living room. my girlfriend sleeps on side of bed closest to window.  she got up, opened window and looked out at front yard of house.  it was dark and she could not see anyone.  it was approximately 11:30 pm.  i got up, quickly dressed and went out front door. it was a damp night and if anyone would have stepped on the grass in front of picture window there would be footprints;  there were none.  i went into back yard and also saw nothing.  at this time there was another apparent knock at the front window.  i looked with a flashlight to see if it might have been a squirrel or raccoon but there was nothing.  we then returned to bedroom and prepared for sleep.  as i crawled into bed, the light in the back bedroom came on.  when i went to see what was the cause, i found that the light switch was in the on position.  after shutting off the light i returned to bed with no further events that night.
   day two:  in my living room was a large persian rug.  this rug was left to me by the previous owner of the home when i purchased it.  this rug, although it was some 15 years old was in excellent condition. over the span of several previous weeks this rug emitted a gray dust that i had never seen before.  if you lifted the rug this dust appeared on the floor.
i took a photograph of the rug that day with my cell phone camera.  i also took a photograph of one corner of the rug pulled back. i was planning to show these photographs to my sister so she could advise on how to clean it.
when i reviewed the photographs the second photo showed something under the fold of the corner. when initially taking the photographs i saw nothing unusual.  it appeared to be a face strikingly like that of the popular image of a gray alien.  when i enlarged the photograph it became more apparent.
   i no longer have the rug, as this event disturbed me so much that i no longer wanted the rug in my house. it was disposed of.  i am including a picture of what the rug looked like in my living room and also a picture with the face visible.  these pictures have not been altered in any way and i would be willing to submit my phone for examination.  there have been several possibly related incidents of small items moved from room to room since.  i would like to speak to an investigator in person if possible.
please keep this confidential.


  i would like a mufon field investigator to examine the photographs in person as i was unable to transfer to this document.
content.summary: Apparition of apparent alien gray seen in photograph of rug in living room,  apparition not seen when photo was taken.

content.detailedDescription: I saw something yesterday on my drive to work, swear to god. it was hovering over this field and somewhere close but not close enough to the airport so it made me suspicious. i got close to it and other drivers were looking at it too. it was a triangle 🔼 shape object like... i know this sounds crazy and i'm totally into this stuff but even i couldn't believe it. it had 3 lights at each point of the triangular points. it literally stated hovering, like no joke. i took a photo of it but the weirdest thing i guess i wasn't pointing my camera over the right direction because it wasn't in the photo. i don't know if it stayed too long but i never saw it fly towards the airport like it was landing ..And as i drove closer i switched directions so it was out of my view. not kidding.
content.summary: Saw a grey triangle shaped object with 3 lights at each of the triangular points. it was hovering over this field

content.detailedDescription: I was driving. looking for parking, when i looked up and saw a few twinkling lights hovering together. very right. reddish orange, but light. i pulled over and got out of the car to see better. more and more appeared, about 10-12 total i think. they kind of floated toward the left, not in a line or in a soecificformationbut definitely together. i watched for a minute or two, called my husband to see what he thought it might be. then one by one they disappeared when they reached a certain point to the left where they were headed. it was silent. it was too coordinated to be lanterns but that's what they seemed like. drones? i've never seen one. why would so many drones be flying together? i have ever seenanything like these lights. can't stop thinking about the event. it happened about 2 hours ago.
content.summary: Spotted a line of twinkling lights in formation almost like a little dipper. moving left.Then more. one my one they disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: A beautiful day very clear afternoon,view clouds in the sky i found my seat onboard my connecting flight from charolette n.C. to dallas,ft.Worth right next to a window seat over the wing as i have always loved to fly. we were still climbing now at about 1000 ft up i keep my eyes glued out the window and from nowhere appeared in perfect detail the 25 to 30 foot round flying saucer shapped craft, which appeared to be curving, turning awsy from hitting the jet i was on. it disapeared and reappeared a 2nd time further past where it was 1st noticed & seemed to wobble i noticed a slight tan tint to the bottom of the craft and was seamless with about 4 or 5 windows arround the smaller dome that sat ontop the liwer disc. it disapeared for a 2nd time again for a fraction of a second then reappearing again further along the back of the aircraft i was in now past the rudder/stabilizer section of my jet. in summary about 3 seconds seen in clear detail a ufo just off the wingtip flash inview the out then in then out then in a 3rd time all about 3 secs. i couldnt see any further past the tail my view being limited of course all passangers had shades pulled and devices phones etc either in thier ears orabout to sleep, no one else paid any attn. i figured wht make a big sceen or say anything theyd think i was crazy, so i kept to ky self.
content.summary: Flight from charolett to okla. just after takeoff lookinh out window port side over wing seen detailed  clearly ufo, like skipped rock on water 40 ft from wing tip visible in & out 3 times

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at 8:30 in the morning, going south on hwy. 259, heading towards longview, tx. first noticed a bright light in sky. thought it was a plane with light but very unusual. but lights got bigger & unnaturally bright. observed this for about 8-9 minutes. i looked around at traffic to see if anyone else had spotted it, but didn't see anyone looking at it. all of a sudden, light disappeared & in it's place was a flying saucer disc shape, kind of grey metallic, with a large fin on top. slanted & concave on right side, flat on top, & a half circle on back. at the time i couldn't believe what i was seeing. blinked my eyes for a better look & it had completely disappeared. i scoured the sky for about 10 minutes & there was nothing.
content.summary: Very bright light, changed to disc, then disappeared

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Moved slowly to the north and out of sight
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was driving east bound on shawnee mission parkway toward quivira when out my left window i observed a rocket type shaped object appear to be hovering it was mainly black with some red on it and then i saw rocket booster flames pulsate out the end as it
